english.segment1: I havent reached perfection. But is that what she needs?. I havent reached the wisdom that she should always heed. And I am just a man. I havent died for her, but I would. Ill do whatever I have to
english.segment2: I may not be her perfect chemistry, But, if I can love her like You do, thats all she needs
english.segment3: I havent found the remedy to every tear shell cry. But Ill try to be the one whos by her side
